title: South Korea’s Kospi Tops 5,000 as AI Demand Fuels Market Surge
description: South Korea’s stock benchmark advanced to cross the 5,000 target set by President Lee Jae Myung, as AI‑driven demand powers the tech‑heavy market.
content: South Korea’s stock benchmark advanced to cross the 5,000 target set by President Lee Jae Myung, as AI‑driven demand powers the tech‑heavy market.
